module.name: individual_activity
module.keywords: module, individual, activity, action, process, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record the existence of a individual activity.
An individual activity is a period in the life of one or more physical individuals, such that one or more of the physical individuals are changed during the period.
Membership of a class of activity may indicate the nature of an individual activity.

example.p: The act of changing the lubricating oil for pump p_101 on 2001-10-09 is an individual_activity.
This individual of activity is a member of the class_of_activity 'change lubricating oil'.

li.p: the existence of a individual activity.

li.note: Class of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_activity application module.

li.p: membership of a class of activity;
li.note: Membership of a class of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
Relationships between individual activities are within the scopes of the Composition_of_individual_activity and Connection_of_individual_activity application modules.

li.p: involvement of things in an individual activity.
li.note: The involvement of things in an individual activity is within the scopes of the Individual_involvement_in_activity application module.

uof.name: Individual_activity
uof.description: The Individual_activity UoF identifies an individual of activity, action or process.
